title: Until last night, I considered League of Legends a respectable game
body:
It has its flaws, the company that runs it sickens me (except you Riot OCE friends, you guys are super cool) but it was fine, even if the e$port$ was obnoxiously over the top.

But, last night we found a problem in my love-hate relationship with League..

"The River King", or rather "The Blatant Bastion Rip Off video".

You can copy game mechanics and put a new hat on it and pretend like you're not feeding your players shit.
You can lie and cheat your players and brush it off / ban them from your dying forums so they don't oust you.
You can shove e$port$ down everyone's throats without realising it's coming out their asses without a care.

But copy paste an indie game's entire aesthetic to hawk your product?

Fucking burn in hell fire. Tencent's following their Chinese production heritage of becoming a cheap knock off of everything decent.

Not to mention, Tencent just went back on their multiple promises to never delete GD in a hilarious titled thread about a "discussion". Another reminder to Tencent's playerbase that they don't discuss- they may label it as one but they'll never change their view.
http://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/site-feedback/Hx8p6GoX-letos-talk-boards-organization#

I may have quit League over half a year ago, but I've never had reason to do this until today.
http://puu.sh/iugKz/9b4e129f15.jpg

no you won't. he hasn't played in months.

Wait, so having a old-style south-western American accent paired with guitar music is copying Bastion? Don't get me wrong, I don't like Riot for other reasons such as their business practices, but I think your argument is pretty stupid here. Bastion didn't invent the "Western" theme. Believe it or not, it's been around for over 100 years.

They are deleting GD because rioters promised to deliver certain things, if they delete the proof (the posts that shows them promising the player base certain features.) then they don't have to implement said features.

It's much easier than actually implementing above features.
Thank you for playing League of Legends, we hope you enjoyed your stay.
